00018 CheckField::CheckField( string fieldLabel, bool fieldRequired, bool fieldReset ) : Field( fieldLabel, fieldRequired, fieldReset)
00019 {
00020

00026 
00027 CheckField::CheckField( vector<string> * description )
00028 {
00029   string str;
00030 
00031   // Start the loop from the second item in the description. This because the type is already known.
00032   for( int i = 1; i<(int)description->size(); i++)
00033   {
00034     str = description->at(i);
00035     
00036     if( str.compare( 0, 7, "Label: ") == 0 )  // ----------------------------------
00037     {
00038       str.erase(0, 7);
00039       this->setLabel( str );
00040     }
00041     else if( str.compare( 0, 10, "Required: ") == 0 ) //---------------------------
00042     {
00043       // Get the substring of str which should contain true or false.
00044       // Convert it to a boolean, this function can throw a FieldException.
00045       // Assign the boolean to required.
00046       try { this->setRequired( this->stringToBool( str.substr(10, 5) ) ); }
00047       catch(  FieldException& e ) 
00048       {
00049         // Add information to the exception to be able to trace its origin. 
00050         e.setFieldType( this->getType() );
00051         e.setFieldLabel( this->getLabel() );
00052         e.addInfo( "Input string was: " + str + "\n" );
00053         throw;
00054       }   
00055       catch( exception& e) { throw; } 
00056     }
00057     else if( str.compare( 0, 7, "Reset: ") == 0 ) //-------------------------------
00058     {
00059       // The same as above but now not for required but for reset.
00060       try { this->setReset( this->stringToBool( str.substr(7, 5) ) ); }
00061       catch(  FieldException& e ) 
00062       {
00063         // Add information to the exception to be able to trace its origin. 
00064         e.setFieldType( this->getType() );
00065         e.setFieldLabel( this->getLabel() );
00066         e.addInfo( "Input string was: " + str + "\n" );
00067         throw;
00068       }       
00069       catch( exception& e) { throw; } 
00070     }
00071     else  //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     {
00073       throw FieldException( 1, this->getType(), this->getLabel(), "Input string was: " + str + "\n" ); // throw Error: unknown item in description 
00074     }
00075     
00076   }
00077   
00078 }
00079

00084 CheckField::~CheckField()
00085 {
00086

00093 string CheckField::getType()
00094 {
00095   return "CheckField";
